SAV Mapping

If you live near the Bay, download the Water Reporter App to help share your #SAV observation’s with our community!

Volunteers from across the Chesapeake Bay watershed have used Water Reporter to collect over 130 observations of submerged aquatic vegetation to help document the increase in abundance and help inform Virginia Institute of Marine Science’s (VIMS) annual aerial survey.
